title: Witcher game series unit sales worldwide as of August 2015
yAxis: Number of units sold in millions
summary: The statistic illustrates the number of series unit sales in the Witcher in 2015 , August Game release .
In 2015 , 6.01 millions Witcher Number owned a The_Witcher_3:_Wild_Hunt_(2015) unit dryer .
As of 2015 , almost 80 millions of Witcher Number had a unit dryer .
